attributes.action: The open dogs in the parks should be banned
attributes.additional_details: Recent incident in newspaper.a child was attacked and died by dog
attributes.background: The open dogs in the parks and public places should be banned.Most of the people especially kids are scared while we are in a park with kids,further they attack on humans

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

In any case, the rules around access to parks for dogs would be the responsibility of your local council or the park owner and not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are concerned about a particular park you could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
